nodes.text: A holographic nursery mobile was a form of holographic technology that simulated objects above the bed of an infant. One version on the Mid Rim planet Naboo contained an opee sea killer, colo claw fish, sando aqua monsters, mee, and see.
While on a mission to Naboo to steal children for Darth Sidious, Cad Bane came across one of these, before encountering Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano.
